Uses of Interface
org.janusgraph.core.schema.Index

  • Packages that use Index 
    Package Description
    org.janusgraph.core.schema  
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.database.management  
    org.janusgraph.graphdb.olap.job  

    • Uses of Index in org.janusgraph.core.schema

      Subinterfaces of Index in org.janusgraph.core.schema 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  JanusGraphIndex
      A JanusGraphIndex is an index installed on the graph in order to be able to efficiently retrieve graph elements by their properties.
      interface  RelationTypeIndex
      A RelationTypeIndex is an index installed on a RelationType to speed up vertex-centric indexes for that type.
      Methods in org.janusgraph.core.schema with parameters of type Index 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      JanusGraphManagement.IndexJobFuture JanusGraphManagement.getIndexJobStatus(Index index)
      If an index update job was triggered through JanusGraphManagement.updateIndex(Index, SchemaAction) with schema actions SchemaAction.REINDEX or SchemaAction.REMOVE_INDEX then this method can be used to track the status of this asynchronous process.
      JanusGraphManagement.IndexJobFuture JanusGraphManagement.updateIndex(Index index, SchemaAction updateAction)
      Updates the provided index according to the given SchemaAction
